attributes.action: Stop the closure of St Peter's College Chelmsford, Essex.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This C of E secondary school and designated performing arts college is due to close in August 2011 due to lack of pupil numbers. However all other secondary schools in the area are over subscribed and do not offer the level of specialist facilities the current students of St Peter's College have available to them. This is the only C of E secondary school in the immediate area available to the relevant section of the increasingly diverse community.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop the closure of St Peter's College Chelmsford, Essex."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19167


Prime Minister's Office
